searchSql.baseSql:
select week.CASE_ORG_ID_F ORG_ID,
sum(case when week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) LOSE_NUM_WEEK,
sum(case when week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) REC_NUM_WEEK,
sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) TOTAL_NUM_WEEK,
isnull(sum(case when week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then week.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT else 0 end),0) LOSE_AMOUNT_WEEK,
isnull(sum(case when week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then week.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT else 0 end),0) REC_AMOUNT_WEEK,
isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then week.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT else 0 end),0) TOTAL_AMOUNT_WEEK,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) else sum(case when week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then 1 else 0 end) end LOSE_NUM_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) else sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then 1 else 0 end) end TOTAL_NUM_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.MORT_COM_AMOUNT else 0 end) else sum(case when week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 1 and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.MORT_COM_AMOUNT else 0 end) end LOSE_AMOUNT_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.MORT_COM_AMOUNT else 0 end), 0) else isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.MORT_COM_AMOUNT else 0 end), 0) end TOTAL_AMOUNT_MONTH
from sctrans.T_RPT_WEEKLY_CASE_BASE_INFO week where week.MORT_TYPE in ('30016001','30016002') and week.TRANSFER_ISPASS = 1 and week.BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #belongEndWeekDay#

select week.CASE_ORG_ID_F ORG_ID,
sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) REC_NUM_WEEK,
sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# and week.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null then 1 else 0 end) EVA_NUM_WEEK,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) else sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then 1 else 0 end) end REC_NUM_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when week.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) else sum(case when week.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then 1 else 0 end) end EVA_NUM_MONTH,
isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then week.CASE_CON_PRICE*0.001 else 0 end),0) EVA_AMOUNT_WEEK,
isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then week.EVA_EVAL_FEE else 0 end),0) EVA_ACT_AMOUNT_WEEK,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then isnull(sum(case when week.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.CASE_CON_PRICE*0.001 else 0 end),0) else isnull(sum(case when week.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.CASE_CON_PRICE*0.001 else 0 end),0) end EVA_AMOUNT_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then isnull(sum(case when week.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.EVA_EVAL_FEE else 0 end),0) else isnull(sum(case when week.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.EVA_EVAL_FEE else 0 end),0) end EVA_ACT_AMOUNT_MONTH
from sctrans.T_RPT_WEEKLY_CASE_BASE_INFO week where week.MORT_TYPE in ('30016001','30016002') and week.TRANSFER_ISPASS = 1 and week.CASE_REC_STATUS = 0 and week.BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #belongEndWeekDay#

select week.CASE_ORG_ID_F ORG_ID,
sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) GUOHU_NUM_WEEK,
sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# and week.ELOAN_KA is not null then week.ELOAN_KA_APPLY_COUNT else 0 end) KA_APP_NUM_WEEK,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) else sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then 1 else 0 end) end GUOHU_NUM_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when week.ELOAN_KA is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.ELOAN_KA_APPLY_COUNT else 0 end) else sum(case when week.ELOAN_KA is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.ELOAN_KA_APPLY_COUNT else 0 end) end KA_APP_NUM_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when week.ELOAN_KA is not null and week.ELOAN_KA_AMOUNT is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.ELOAN_KA_CARD_COUNT else 0 end) else sum(case when week.ELOAN_KA is not null and week.ELOAN_KA_AMOUNT is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.ELOAN_KA_CARD_COUNT else 0 end) end KA_NUM_MONTH,
(select count(1) from sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE ec where ec.STATUS != 'ABAN' and ec.EXCUTOR_TEAM = week.CASE_ORG_ID_F and EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE IN ('30004005','30004015') and cast(convert(varchar(8) , EC.CREATE_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay#) ELOAN_KA_APP_NUM_MONTH,
(select isnull(sum(ec.APPLY_AMOUNT),0) from sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE ec where ec.STATUS != 'ABAN' and ec.EXCUTOR_TEAM = week.CASE_ORG_ID_F and EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE IN ('30004005','30004015') and cast(convert(varchar(8) , EC.CREATE_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay#) ELOAN_KA_APP_AMOUNT_MONTH
from sctrans.T_RPT_WEEKLY_CASE_BASE_INFO week where week.TRANSFER_ISPASS = 1 and week.BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #belongEndWeekDay#

select week.CASE_ORG_ID_F ORG_ID,
sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) GUOHU_NUM_WEEK,
isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# then week.CASE_CON_PRICE else 0 end),0) HOUSE_PRICE_WEEK,
sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# and week.ELOAN_PRO is not null then week.ELOAN_PRO_APPLY_COUNT else 0 end) PRO_APP_NUM_WEEK,
isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) ,week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #startWeekDay# and #endWeekDay# and week.ELOAN_PRO is not null then week.ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT else 0 end),0) PRO_APP_AMOUNT_WEEK,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then 1 else 0 end) else sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then 1 else 0 end) end GUOHU_NUM_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.CASE_CON_PRICE else 0 end),0) else isnull(sum(case when cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.CASE_CON_PRICE else 0 end),0) end HOUSE_PRICE_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then sum(case when week.ELOAN_PRO is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.ELOAN_PRO_APPLY_COUNT else 0 end) else sum(case when week.ELOAN_PRO is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.ELOAN_PRO_APPLY_COUNT else 0 end) end PRO_APP_NUM_MONTH,
case when #startWeekDay#/100 = #endWeekDay#/100 then isnull(sum(case when week.ELOAN_PRO is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay# then week.ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT else 0 end),0) else isnull(sum(case when week.ELOAN_PRO is not null and cast(convert(varchar(8) , week.TRANSFER_APP_PASS_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #lastMonthStartDay# and #lastMonthEndDay# then week.ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT else 0 end),0) end PRO_APP_AMOUNT_MONTH,
(select count(1) from sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE ec where ec.STATUS != 'ABAN' and ec.EXCUTOR_TEAM = week.CASE_ORG_ID_F and EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE NOT IN ('30004005','30004015') and cast(convert(varchar(8) , EC.CREATE_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay#) ELOAN_PRO_APP_NUM_MONTH,
(select isnull(sum(ec.APPLY_AMOUNT),0) from sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE ec where ec.STATUS != 'ABAN' and ec.EXCUTOR_TEAM = week.CASE_ORG_ID_F and EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE NOT IN ('30004005','30004015') and cast(convert(varchar(8) , EC.CREATE_TIME, 112 ) as int) between #endWeekDay#/100*100+1 and #endWeekDay#) ELOAN_PRO_APP_AMOUNT_MONTH
from sctrans.T_RPT_WEEKLY_CASE_BASE_INFO week where week.TRANSFER_ISPASS = 1 and week.BELONG_WEEK_END_DAY = #belongEndWeekDay#
